title: Extra Large 2bdrm + Full Office in Classic 3flat Virtual Tour Availabl
posting_body: Great price for a Lakeview 2 bedroom plus full size office with a closet!
Only 3 apartments in this classic Chicago apartment building.
Very sunny spacious 3 bedroom apartment with beautiful original woodwork.

Take yourself on a virtual 360 tour of another floor that is basically the same unit, just without the built-in in the dining room: https://kuula.co/share/collection/7P7VM?fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&initload=0&thumbs=1&info=0&logo=-1
*Separate Formal Dining room, GREAT for entertaining or home office!
*Lots of kitchen cabinets and counter space
Located at Marshfield & Cornelia, this apartment for rent is 3 blocks West of Southport, 1 block East of Lincoln Avenue and only 1 block to Paulina Brown Line "L" stop.
One block to Starbucks, restaurants, nightlife and shopping on Lincoln Avenue.
Plus Whole Foods, Trader Joes, restaurants and a brand new Target within walking distance.
The building is family owned and managed and we care about our tenants and their apartment homes.
We are Central City Management and started in business in 1968.
Please go to Yelp and Google to see what former and present tenants say about us.
